guide.introduction: This robot is built with Arduino Microcontroller ChipKIT and programmed in MPIDE environment. With this robot you will be able to complete any kind of maze. It uses only two IR range sensors and has a very simple logic that any one can follow.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This robot is built with Arduino Microcontroller ChipKIT and programmed in MPIDE environment. With this robot you will be able to complete any kind of maze. It uses only two IR range sensors and has a very simple logic that any one can follow.

Tools
  • 2 H BRIDGES
  • 2 Sharp IR sensors
  • 2 motors
  • 3 Wheels
  • Arduino Uno
  • Extension cable, USB A/B
